column4: hmm why do I get e: 175 pos: 1 parser failed somehow near here: (EOL) at lighttpd.conf?
then I would be looking for your error there, or the line above.
it appears your fastcgi.server section is wonky
should I search for another fastcgi.server section?
why not remove that and then do lighty-enable-mod fastcgi
yes, you need to remove the fastcgi.server section in your lighttpd.conf
does a file with mod-fastcgi exist in /etc/lighttpd/conf-enabled?
it was on the lighttpd folder, so I moved into conf-enabled
so you didn't do sudo lighty-enable-mod fastcgi then?
please pastebin the output of ls -la /etc/lighttpd/conf-enabled and your new lighttpd.conf as well as /etc/init.d/lighttpd start
I've completely purged all php5 debs and lighttpd and reinstalled them
